resources.string: Click on [img src=ic_action_settings/] icon to navigate to the "Settings" screen, select the list of apps whose usage time has to be tracked by enabling them.
Click on [img src=ic_action_refresh/] icon to refresh the selected applications and its usage time
Find Daily usage in minutes, Weekly and Monthly usage in hours by clicking on the respective tabs
Pinch to zoom in and zoom out the bar chart, to get a clear look
Scroll horizontally to view the usage time for all the apps selected
